summary: The diff shows partial implementation of shopping-related conversation scenarios in backend/main.mo, but the changes are heavily truncated. Only scenarios for Arabic (id=17) and partial Swahili (id=18) are visible. There is no evidence of culture entries, frontend integration, or complete coverage across all 6 languages.

missing_requirements.requirement: Complete conversation scenarios for all 6 languages (only Arabic and partial Swahili visible in truncated diff)
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows only 2 conversation scenarios (Arabic id=17, Swahili id=18 truncated). REQ-1 requires 3-5 scenarios per language across 6 languages (18-30 total scenarios). Hausa, Amharic, Yoruba, and Zulu scenarios are not visible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add culture entries about shopping customs and marketplace traditions for all 6 languages
missing_requirements.reason: No CultureEntry instances related to shopping customs, marketplace traditions, or commercial areas are visible in the diff. REQ-2 requires 2-3 culture entries per language (12-18 total entries).

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend integration to display new shopping units as unlockable nodes in the learning path
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files were modified. REQ-3 requires changes to ensure new content appears in LearningPage with proper grouping (e.g., 'Unit 3: Shopping & Places'), lock/unlock states, and XP rewards.

missing_requirements.requirement: Unit grouping and labeling for shopping-related content
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of unit labeling logic (e.g., 'Unit 3: Shopping & Places', 'Unit 4: Markets & Stores') in the diff. This requires frontend or backend changes to support proper unit grouping.
